text: The Pareora River is a river of the Canterbury Region of New Zealand's South Island. It has its starts as several small streams flowing from the Hunters Hills, and flows north before turning southeast to reach the Pacific ocean at the southern end of Pareora, south of Timaru.Creed 2014 ==Related pages== *List of rivers of New Zealand == Notes == ==References== * * Category:Rivers of Canterbury, New Zealand
title: Pareora River
